description:
Call of Juarez The Gunslinger will take you to the expanses of the legendary Wild West - a place where unique atmosphere of lawlessness and cruelty. Get used to the role of a ruthless bounty hunter, find and shoot the most notorious villains. You have to go in dirty saloons, gold mines and many other places where they can hide criminals. The new part of the famous franchise will be filled with hardcore and full of realistic gunfights. Players expect many hours of exciting adventures. Hold the gun at the ready, if you do not want shlopotat bullet!
